name: Blaster
description: Blaster is the default weapon your ship possesses in Nova Drift. Twin bullets. Projectile size deteriorates over time

name: Flak
description: A deadly burst of shrapnel that shreds close-range targets. Doubles added projectiles gained from upgrades. Projectiles decelerate and degenerate over time

name: Railgun
description: Fire a high-velocity, long-range projectile. Projectiles penetrate destroyed targets, creating a spray of shrapnel and dealing blast damage. Damage scales with projectile velocity
